description:
Located in Burlington, North Carolina, the Lanier Law Group P.A. provides unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout Alamance County and beyond who have personal injury or wrongful death claims arising from any of the following:

• Motor vehicle accidents
• Medical malpractice
• Sexual assault
• Unsafe property conditions
• Dog bites and animal attacks
• Defective products
• Other preventable tragedies

Additionally, our law firm can also assist with filing your initial workers' compensation or Social Security Disability claim or appealing a denied claim. No matter which of our practice areas fits your unique situation, we are completely devoted to doing whatever we can to help you obtain the maximum amount of compensation you need during this very difficult and uncertain time in your life.

Over the course of our history, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, and our law firm has grown to include 11 total law offices across the state, making us one of North Carolina's leading injury practices. As evidence of our success, our attorneys have earned designations as Top 100 Trial Lawyers from The National Trial Lawyers and America's Top 100 High Stakes Litigators along with many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers.

Considering all that's at stake, you need a heavyweight in your corner to fight for your rights and entitlements and to significantly increase your odds of achieving the justice you deserve. To begin the process, you can receive a free evaluation of your claim by contacting the Lanier Law Group P.A. and setting up an appointment. Our law firm also offers virtual consultations so that you don't have to leave the safety of your home to speak with us.
